query: SELECT ID, MUID, VersionName, VersionNumber, Version_ID, VersionFlag, Name, Code, ChangeTrackingMask, [Customer Golden Key_Code] as Customer_Golden_Key_Code, [Customer Golden Key_Name] as Customer_Golden_Key_Name, [Customer Golden Key_ID] as Customer_Golden_Key_ID, [Customer To Map_Code] as Customer_To_Map_Code, [Customer To Map_Name] as Customer_To_Map_Name, [Customer To Map_ID] as Customer_To_Map_ID, EnterDateTime, EnterUserName, EnterVersionNumber, LastChgDateTime LastChgUserName, LastChgVersionNumber, ValidationStatus FROM mdm.[Customer Mapping]
